共计 (一共/一起) (总共/总计): 共鸣 (同感) (...引起了...的共鸣)

in total: to collude with/to collaborate with/to gang up with (to split up)
to fail to live up (to expectations)/to let down/disappoint
oddly/queer (things that catch your attention because they're a bit quirky or out of the ordinary)
native/inherent (quality) (to inherit/succeed to the throne etc/carry on a tradition etc)
consultant/adviser (to give advice) (imperial strategic adviser) (tatician/strategist/skilled manipulator)
to hire/employ (to accept an applicant or an employee/to hire a job candidate)
